dialogue: Spirit and Tequia board Spirit's ship and begin the journey to Regnum.
Is there anything I should know before we actually reach Regnum?
When we get there, you'll be assigned under my platoon.
The Empire's fourth platoon serves serves
semi-autonomously from the rest of the army.
The only power within the Empire that can give us
orders is her heighness the Empress herself.
When we're deployed on the battlefield, we'll be responsible
for attacking the enemy when they least expect it.
For that reason, our troops are fewer in number, but more elite
than other platoons. We also provide support to other platoons.
We used to have a very talented pilot with us, but
they unfortunately...'retired' a few weeks ago.
They were able to fly this ship through streams of bullets,
through swarms of other ships, past any natural obstructions...
I expect you to live up to their legacy, or even surpass it.
Those are big shoes to fill. But don't worry.
